headline: New Filtrete Refillable Air Filter delivers cleaner air and less waste
summary: Filtrete™ Brand, the number one trusted brand in residential HVAC air filters,1 is excited to announce the new Filtrete Refillable Air Filter Kit. This innovative kit addresses common consumer pain points by offering a reusable frame that lasts up to 20 years and a collapsible filter that lasts up to 12 months.
